articles.author: Kris Holt
articles.title: Microsoft Edge update adds tab groups and new shopping features
articles.description:
Just ahead of the Windows 11 launch
, Microsoft is rolling out
 some updates to Edge
. Perhaps the most useful feature for most people is the addition of tab groups. You'll be able to assemble collections of tabs to make your browser a little less chaotic.…
articles.content:
